subject: College Athletics
Basketball
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Bobcats, who have not lost in 21 straight games, are the top-ranked team in men’s college hockey. Players credit their ascent to Muzzy Power, referring to their mustaches.
snippet: The Bobcats, who have not lost in 21 straight games, are the top-ranked team in men’s college hockey. Players credit their ascent to Muzzy Power, referring to their mustaches.
